question: Which Union Ministry launched ‘National GIS-enabled land bank system’?
option3: Ministry of Road Transport and Highways
option4: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
explanation:
Union Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal has launched the prototype of the ‘National GIS-enabled land bank system’.
It enables the investors to get real-time information about the availability of industrial land and resources. The project is initially launched for six states and will expanded to all states/UTs by December 2020.
